article:
{{multiple issues|



}}

Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment has released several hundred titles to
home video since 1978, as well as direct-to-video features. They have been
released on VHS, Betamax, Laserdisc, CED Videodisc, CD Video, DVD, Universal
Media Disc, and Blu-ray Disc. These are most of the notable releases that Disney
put out on home video.
headings: Wrapped and Ready to Give Promotion (1984)
Special Edition, Anniversary Edition and other editions
Other Disney video and DVD releases (1989-present)
Walt Disney Animation Collection: Classic Short Films
